column4: I am getting an error saying I need to update Flash plugin for browser for  while. Near as I can tell I have the latest. Also, it does not matter which browser I use, same error. My default browser is Firefox, but have Chrome and Empathy as well.
lol, I am using Ubuntu so I don't have to use command line :-) is there an easier way?
the easiest way is to use the command line
you can sit and fiddle about with clicking on little pictures for a long time, before you achieve the same effect that you get by just asking for what you want
